mapper.insert: update tb_type_filed_count set count_man=count_man+#{count} where case_type=#{case_type} and field=#{field}
mapper.select: select field,count_man from tb_type_filed_count where case_type = #{case_type} order by count_man desc limit #{size}
select count(count_man) from tb_type_filed_count where case_type = #{case_type} and field=#{field}
select count_man from tb_type_filed_count where case_type = 'JobConfig' and field='JobConfig'
mapper.sql: BMSAH, TYSAH, AJMC, CBDW_MC, AJLB_MC, CJSJ, IS_COMPLETE
mapper.select:
select
from aj_yx_aj where AJLB_MC = #{value} and IS_COMPLETE=1
mapper.update: update aj_yx_aj set IS_COMPLETE = #{arg0} where BMSAH = #{arg1}
mapper.select: select AJLB_MC,count(*) as c from aj_yx_aj GROUP BY AJLB_MC
select count(*) from aj_yx_aj where AJLB_MC = '刑事检察'
select count(*) from aj_yx_aj where AJLB_MC = '刑事执行'
select count(*) from aj_yx_aj where AJLB_MC = '公益诉讼'
select count(*) from aj_yx_aj where AJLB_MC = '民事'
select count(*) from aj_yx_aj where AJLB_MC = '行政'
select count(*) from aj_yx_aj where AJLB_MC = '未检业务'
select count(*) from aj_yx_aj where AJLB_MC = '控告申诉'
select count(*) from aj_yx_aj where AJLB_MC = '检委办'
select count(*) from aj_yx_aj where AJLB_MC = '对台业务'
select count(*) from aj_yx_aj where AJLB_MC = '案管'
select count(*) from aj_yx_aj where AJLB_MC = '司法协助'
